title: Delectable New York Cheesecake
ingredients: ['900g cream cheese', '150g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '250ml soured cream', '125g digestive biscuits, crushed into crumbs', '6 tablespoons melted unsalted butter', '4 tablespoons caster sugar']
